relics.name: Dusty Relic
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 1 additional card and heal 3 HP.

relics.name: Marine Biologist
relics.description: At the start of combat gain 1 theconstrictor:Blur
relics.flavorText: Eyes the color of the ocean. They reminds me of home.

relics.name: Slimy Shield
relics.description: At the start of each combat, reduce your theconstrictor:Constricting by 6.
relics.flavorText: Proof of victory in a hard fought battle.

relics.name: Smudged Stone
relics.description: Whenever you play 12 cards, Gain 1 theconstrictor:Blur.
relics.flavorText: Hard to eat, not that pretty. What's the point?

relics.name: Rockfish
relics.description: At the start of each combat, Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: The Hardest and strongest of all fish. Nom nom nom.

relics.name: Lil Friend
relics.description: At the start of combat add 3 theconstrictor:LilHit to your hand.
relics.flavorText: Maybe I judged you too harshly. Tag along if you wish.

relics.name: Polished Relic
relics.description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards and heal 6 HP.
relics.flavorText: Well cared for by The Collector.

relics.name: StrangeRing
relics.description:
Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn.
At the start of each combat, Gain 10 theconstrictor:Constricting.
relics.flavorText: Very hard to eat and tasteless. 0/10.

relics.name: Pollution
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 4 theconstrictor:Constricting to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: AbsoluteValue
keywords.description: Absolute value is a numbers distance from 0.

keywords.name: Blur
keywords.description: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Constricting
keywords.description: Constricted characters lose HP after damage is dealt.

keywords.name: LilHit
keywords.description: A 0 cost card that deals 3 damage, grants 3 block, draws one card, and Exhausts.

keywords.name: RisingWater
keywords.description: At the end of your turn increase by one and deal damage to ALL enemies.

mods.name: TheConstrictor
mods.description: Thanks to the mod the spire community for helping me make this mod. I hope you enjoy it.
